Articles.Content:
All my unmanned vessels, modded or stock, once they are in space, they begin to rotate! They are not rotating, and are clearly out of an atmosphere. The rotation starts slowly, then increases to a speed which makes it impossible to pick out details on the vessel. It tends to rotate left, like if the "A" key was stuck down. I can still engage SAS.

It appears this only occurs in Stability Assist mode.

-Carlpilot
Can you post some pictures of the craft in question? It might be something to do with how you're building them.

It happens with all my unmanned vessels. One particularly uncontrollable example:

OKTO2

Short 1.25m fuel tank

Rockomax 48-7S

-Carlpilot

Well, the OKTO2 doesn't have any torque of its own, so whether it's rotating randomly or not, it'd be next to impossible to control.

Might be a good idea to check you haven't accidentally set trim, though -- Alt+X will zero out any trim settings. But really, some screenshots would probably help. This doesn't sound normal at all. You don't have any mods installed, do you?

Yes, I would have to agree. There are several "normal" reasons this could be happening. Pictures would help out a lot. It might just be one of the usual gameplay thing, but if it's not we'd like to know.

Cheers,

~Claw
